Delete:
generate for(i=0; i<8; i=i+1)
     begin : gen_iddr           
	IDDRE1 #(.DDR_CLK_EDGE  ("SAME_EDGE_PIPELINED"))
	iddr_data (
		   .Q1 (rx_word_iddr[i]),
		   .Q2 (rx_word_iddr[i+8]),
		   .C  (rx_lclk_iddr),//rx_lclk_iddr
		   .CB  (~rx_lclk_iddr),
		   .D  (rxi_delay_out[i] ^ invert_pins),
		   .R  (1'b0)
		   );
     end
